E_MISSING_CLIENT_ENTRY_FILE.message: The Radonis client entry file does not exist at "{{ path }}"

E_MISSING_COMPONENTS_DIRECTORY.message: The Radonis components directory does not exist at "{{ path }}"

E_CANNOT_NEST_HYDRATION_ROOT.message: Found HydrationRoot "{{ hydrationRootIdentifier }}" for component "{{ componentIdentifier }}" nested inside HydrationRoot "{{ parentHydrationRootIdentifier }}" for component "{{ parentComponentIdentifier }}". This is not allowed, as each HydrationRoot acts as root for a React app when hydrated on the client

E_CANNOT_RENDER_VIEW.message: There was an error rendering the view. Check the console for more info
